en.title: FusionExcel At World Health & Asian Traditional Medicine Conference & Exhibition.
en.content:
REPORT BY FE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR JASEN KHOO. 

To show her appreciation and gratitude to FusionExcel International and in particular to Mr. Paul Ting, CEO of FusionExcel International, for sponsoring the inaugural Health & Happiness Festival in March 2009, Madam Myriam Oliveres, the Festival Organizer who is also a FE member, participated in the World Health & Asian Traditional Medicine Conference & Exhibition (What's Medicine 2009) by taking up an exhibition booth to show not only her pet project, Wealth of Women Centre for underprivileged and abused women but also FusionExcel International. 

The conference & exhibition, which was held on 19th - 21st June 2009 at the Putra World Trade Centre, Kuala Lumpur, provided Myriam Oliveres the platform and opportunity to create awareness amongst the participants of the conference and exhibition as well as trade visitors and the general public of the Quantum Pendant and other FE products and their benefits. 

Myriam Oliveres was supported by FE Presidential Director, Fay Lim and FE Executive Director, Jasen Khoo besides members of her family. FE representatives gave demonstrations of the effects and benefits of the Quantum Pendant to the participants and visitors, to their amazement. 

Myriam Oliveres also took the initiative to sponsor a Quantum Pendant as a lucky draw prize for visitors to her exhibition booth and this drew a lot of excitement and interest, attracting a significant number of visitors to the booth.
